text: Nomuli, gei Jehoiada gu haga ulu a Joash gi daha, guu dugu di hau king gi hongo dono libogo, gaa wanga ana beebaa gi mee ala e iai nnaganoho i nnangahaihai o nia king. Gei Joash ga hagatulu e hai di king. Nia daangada gu paapaa nadau lima, gu wwolowwolo gi nua boloo, “Di king gi mouli hua beelaa!”
